comments:
Build 20020521
Linux-GTK

1. In a runtime workbench launch config, go to the tracing tab and enable 
tracing.
2. Launch the config

The following is dumped to the console:

Unable to construct URL for options file: 
"file:/home/jburns/target/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.pde.core/.options"
java.net.MalformedURLException: no protocol: 
"file:/home/jburns/target/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.pde.core/.options"
	at java.net.URL.<init>(URL.java:579)
	at java.net.URL.<init>(URL.java:476)
	at java.net.URL.<init>(URL.java:425)
	at 
org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.loadOptions(InternalBootLoader.java:548)
	at 
org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.initialize(InternalBootLoader.java:500)
	at 
org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.startup(InternalBootLoader.java:868)
	at 
org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run(InternalBootLoader.java:732)
	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:432)
	at EclipseRuntimeLauncher.main(EclipseRuntimeLauncher.java:24)

If I manually change the value of the URL to 
"file://localhost/home/jburns/target/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.pde.core/.options",
it works.

Should be trivial - related to URL format for the tracing file in the workbench 
launcher delegate.
Fixed.  Look for the fix in the 2.0 F2 driver.
